jobDescription: Working at Critical Informatics (CI)  Being part of the CI team means that you’ll be on a team that has a single focus – astonishing our customers with our responsiveness, dedication, and capability in managing the security of their IT environment. We are small but growing, and we conduct our work in small teams, with lean, agile rituals that encourage autonomy, self-improvement, and data-driven decision making. We are a learning organization; we apply our concept of Critical Informatics University to internships, onboarding, career paths, research, and product evolution. We believe work should be fun, meaningful, and focused.  We are world-class information security professionals providing Managed Security Services. The world is increasingly digital, and we defend digital health. Because our customers make life better, we extend their teams and technologies to make them better.  The Work  Security Operations Center (SOC) Analysts work with a team to identify, investigate, and respond to our customer’s cybersecurity threats.  Performance Objectives @ 90 day you have: Established relationships with co-workers to enable performance as a team member.Learned and put into action:The mission and values of CIThe policies and practices of CIThe work performed and performance expectations
